item.title: Machine learning environment build: WLS2+Ubuntu+CUDA+cuDNN
item.description: I recently bought a new laptop, and the first thing I had to do after getting the computer was to configure the machine learning environment. Some mistakes were made in the middle, so they were sorted out for those who might need them. Installing Windows Subsystem WLS2 The main reasons for updating from WSL 1 to WSL 2 include improved file system performance. Support for full system call compatibility. WSL
